rule.name: SLA_GenerateData2
rule.description: Given the data subset for SLA entries this rule returns arrays of (Above SLA, Meets SLA, Exceeds SLA) containing amount of records where the record met the category requirements. EX: (scenario with 4 milestones) aboveSLA: {2,3,4,1} , MeetsSLA: {2,3,4,1}, ExceedsSLA: {2,3,4,1}
